original_text:
The law of your mouth is better to me
    than thousands of gold and silver pieces.
korean_text: 주의 입의 법이 내게는 천천 금은보다 좋으니이다

sentences.original_text: The law of your mouth is better to me
sentences.korean_translation: 주의 입의 율법은 내게는 더 좋습니다

sentences.original_text: than thousands of gold and silver pieces
